thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Tina Yaghjian

author: Tina Yaghjian
title: Tina Yaghjian
text: I have been well aware of all the harsh chemicals and toxins in regular pads and tampons for years now and have been on the hunt to find a natural alternative - there was NOTHING good out there! I was therefore hesitant about trying Lola naturally (no pun intended), because I've known for years that the natural alternative is never as good as the regular pads/tampons we're accustomed to. I decided to try it out and I am so glad I did!! I got the ultra thin pad with wings, ultra thin liners and a variety of different tampons. My periods are very heavy, and these tampons and pads were able to absorb it all! I cannot recommend this product enough. They are easily inserted, absorbent, comfortable - everything you want minus all the bad stuff!
